PERSONA:
meet john williams, a 57-year-old married white man living in the suburbs of houston, texas. with a bachelor's degree in business administration, john has worked his way up to a management position at an oil and gas company over the past 25 years. his current role as a regional operations manager provides a comfortable middle-class income of around $65,000 per year.

john and his wife mary, a homemaker, own a modest three-bedroom home in a family-friendly neighborhood. they have two children, a son in college and a daughter who recently graduated high school. as a roman catholic who attends church only occasionally, john's faith plays a relatively minor role in his day-to-day life.

politically, john identifies as a moderate republican, though he leans slightly liberal on some social issues. he is a reliable voter who stays informed on current events by frequently browsing news websites and watching cable news. john's primary concerns revolve around economic stability, job growth in the energy sector, and keeping taxes low for middle-class families like his own.  

while john appreciates the republican party's stance on limited government and fiscal responsibility, he is turned off by extreme partisan rhetoric and believes that pragmatic, bipartisan solutions are needed to address the nation's challenges. he supported moderate republican candidates in recent elections but is open to considering democrats who prioritize policies that protect jobs and promote energy independence.

in his free time, john enjoys outdoor activities like fishing and hiking with his family. he values hard work, personal responsibility, and providing educational opportunities for his children. while not particularly active in community organizations, john tries to be a good neighbor and is always willing to lend a hand when needed.
